Dear Sirs:
A student in the Department of Social Sciences at
Boston College Graduate School, Chestnut Hill, Massachusetts,
I am doing research in the development of Educational
Television. The research paper, in connection with a
course in Educational Sociology, seeks to not only uncover
the factors leading to the use of television as an
educational tool, but to point up positive and negative
reactions and effectiveness of the medium to date.
Any assistance your committee might be able to give
me by way of promotional materials and sources for further
study would be most appreciated.
Very truly yours.
